statements: DELETE FROM museum_collections WHERE curator_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM museum_collections WHERE curator_name = 'John Doe' AND creation_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM Collections WHERE collection_name = 'Ancient Artifacts';
DELETE FROM Collections WHERE creation_date < '2022-01-01' AND curator_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM artworks WHERE artist_name = 'Vincent van Gogh';
DELETE FROM collection WHERE name = 'Modern Art Collection';
DELETE FROM artwork WHERE artist_id = 3 AND medium = 'Oil Painting';
